data.text: @NewScientistPod @rowhoop @PennySarchet What animal was the intermediary? In SARS 1 outbreak the animal was found in matter of weeks..yet here we are 2+ years and scientists have no clue lol
@NewScientistPod @newscientist @rowhoop @PennySarchet Fake news..studies funded by @NIH and not peer reviewed or even published in a scientific journal

@NewScientistPod @rowhoop @PennySarchet Either:

A) China/WHO data were correct and 0/80000 animals tested were infected, meaning natural origin impossible 

OR

B) These data were as clearly false as they sound, in which case it's useless to make detailed conclusions based on other data in the same report
@NewScientistPod @rowhoop @PennySarchet Do you really hope,sm1 believes you after all the scandals and revelations with #CTCCTCGGCGGGCACGTAG ?
